page.title: 06SPARKFORD MUSEUM
page.content: We visited Sparkford Museum this morning.The museum is owned by Mr Haynes.It has over 40 cars in it,vintage cars and cars from the 60's. We were the first public people to see the cars in the museum.It was very interesting looking at and reading about the cars. Everybody thought that the museum was interesting especially when the curator started up two cars.All the boys chose a car,Renfred akind of Limousine,Simon an AC Cobra.Daniel a Stingray and I chose a Jaguar XJS.It was officially opened on the 10/7/85 by Richard Noble, the holder of the world Landspeed record.A lot of famous people came from the racing world.
